Here is a bullet list of required elements:

*   Female doll, side view
*   Long, wavy, light brown hair
*   Light-colored, textured headband
*   Small, light-colored stud earring (on visible ear)
*   Red, structured corset-style bodice
*   Sheer red fabric on bodice shoulders/straps
*   Voluminous, floor-length, sheer red tulle skirt
*   Sparkly silver full-length leggings
*   Silver pointed-toe high heels
*   Solid red background
